posts.title: Doge;  It's a trap
posts.content:
We all recognize and want the federal government to shrink. But at the present moment to "America first" naturalized immigrants behind the helm of Doge, are calling Americans retarded and calling for more immigration from shit hole countries. They seem to recognize this administrative state as one of the most powerful branches of government.

It is quite possible that Doge will target not just junk organization as to create a forest, while also cutting down some specific trees of highly qualified government officials. Positions that will likely need to be filled again "out of necessity", or will likely come back because of a general understanding of the "dynamics" of systems.

The Talent that is gone, but to be restored, are prime to be replaced, maybe not in the Trump administration but the administration that follows, by foreigners.

What this translates to is that the future of the American administrative state may be occupied by "highly skilled" Indian immigrants; whites need not apply, as per always. Do you hear me, our powerful administration state and our institutions may be controlled by foreign actors who have been invited in exploiting an attack vector of recognizing the need to shrink our bloated and corrupt government.

There is also another thing about dynamics. if you are able to obtain a population of but 13% of a fixed belief, and about an 87% of the population with a mixed belief, that over numerous social interactions, that what started as a minority fixed belief will be have plurality. With a very small population, a hostile foreign actor can change the policy in democratic institutions if they immigrate people in of a like mind. See marvel et al.

The dynamics of systems is also very important to consider what is happening to our own techworkers. The science of ecology, heavily occupied by the communist left out of environmentalism, have a principle called competitive exclusion. That when two species are competing for the same resources, that one will drive the other to extinction. We are seeing this already in tech, as white male grads can't even get a job and all the jobs are going to foreigners. See Lotka-Volterra equations,

This is also what is going on to our birth rates as well. Civilized people, for thousands of years, have had standards on how they want to raise kids. In contrast. Foreigners tend to grow up in the slums, so they have a greater capacity to have kids where civilized people would recognize that they can't and that it would be irresponsible to do so. Certainly we seen this in europe with ads convincing white people not to have kids to save the planet, while encouraging minorities to have kids. That somehow a Womans beach body is bad, only to be replaced with healthy at any size. American already has an obesity crisis, so why bother being healthy, happy, and desirable. Outside of a fetish, does anyone really want to have kids with a land whale (male or female), and what is the life expectancy of this "healthy at any size" land whale? Something wants people of European decent erased from the face of the earth.

Vivek in calling all Americans retarded, highlighted the media culture in the 1990s that tended to push jocks and cheerleaders. Not to forget, some of the TV girls (winnie cooper, blossum) back then went on to become mathematicians and neuroscientists in their real life studies. Anyways, not everyone was a jock or a cheerleader; there were nerds and couldn't escape their caste (which has also been pounded in the media too), see for example the grim advenures of billy and mandy regarding irwin, south park, "the list", Nerds were being forcefully and heavily bullied, made fun of, and ostracized everywhere in the media. They weren't being pushed to become a jock as Vivek avers-although maybe today the males are being pushed to become female cheerleaders by the groomers. This was to apply extra stress on nerdy people to make them useful tools for society with zero distractions, but also ensure that they were removed from the gene pool. In horticulture stressing plants is often done to cause them to produce a higher yield as a final reproductive effort. The narrative Vivek was trying to sell the public is not in fact true, the truth is american coders had to work harder to try to achieve the basic human needs that were intentionally deprived to him (being able to interact with others, ending loneliness, more specifically logos or claiming his basic humanity through acceptance of a woman). Ostracism is very painful for evolutionary reasons, and even the mighty tiger is expect to die quickly when excluded from a pack. So they were motivated to end this loneliness, that (inability to interact with others, impairs social development, etc) which has become part of the DSM-V diagnotic for autistic spectrum disorders. However this stress model of obtaining higher yeilds wasn't perfect. Some may have burned up in the process and quit, "die", others with the mix of ssris (or possibly schizophrenia in teddy's case) have gone violently insane, and others went with the flow. It was noted in the early 2010s that silicon valley was full of 40 year old virgins, left to attend counseling. It was also reported that Americans with the highest Iqs had the highest levels of virginity. Back in the 90s these autistic people could easily fetch 100k+ a year and no one would have really identified them as autistic like we diagnose just about every kid today. Today, the underemployment rate of a college educated autistic person is estimated to be between 85-95% and they are persona non-gratis in their home country. Many might have to go on disability costing the taxpayers money because of the severe harm rendered to them socially if they are capable of such humiliation, they may not be able to get a job outside of tech because of the coerced isolation-and certainly they can't get a job inside of tech due to discrimination. But the point I am trying to emphasize is there is an extinction event going on and it is against the best mathematical minds in the country. Something has been going on for decades. There may be gifted people outside of mathematics which is great, but that is not my focus.

But there is another factor to consider. The autistic have their own fixed rigged beliefs, but they also have a limited number of social interactions. The existence of a native autistic population makes it harder to for nefarious actor to succeed than this original 13% threshold, and the autistic are virtually immune to effects to change their mind. Whether through an extinction type event, or whether through coerced silence [and deprived political power] through economic controls of some highly educated voices, if there is an agenda to conquer a nation through policies, it is made that much easier through further suppressing the voices of the native autistic community.

We have to put American first, and we may be at a pivotal crossroads for the future of western civilization. Somehow, the man who donned the armor of baphomet, managed to deceive us; Even the serpent can quote scripture. A man whose empire was subsidize to the tune of well over 20 billion dollars, and became the world's richest man, has decided to thank to this country by stabbing our workers in the back, leaving them in perpetual student loan debt, underemployed, and letting a foreign nation invade us. While we have anti-dumping laws that are intended to protect our trade, we don't have anything to protect our trades.

We need to be very cautious of what they do to with DOGE, and even more, we much end their h-1b agendas.

Elon is not in a good situation right now. The democrats hate him, the EU hates him, and he started to remove the blue checkmarks of MAGA supporters, and gave instructions to his Indian invaders to start blocking and muting them as to limit their reach; Effectively the satanic, and unchristian, act of depriving MAGA of logos is costing him whatever good will he previously had.

We might consider that if he doesn't start to represent maga and open the doors to our tech workers, that the stock of his companies may go down, and boycotts may follow (people already claim to be ending their subscriptions to x, but that would be nothing compared to boycotting starlink or tesla), and that he has no political allies anywhere left in the world. A substantial fall will cause the security lawyers to hone in on him relentlessly like a pack of hyenas with negative pres releases for at least a year as to cause further panic, and I can't say that an America jury would hold him in high esteem given his open statements on American tech workers if he doesn't settle.

We are at a pivotal point where we can stop the globalist agenda, where we can save our tech workers, where we can protect our autistic community, that we can stop the invasion, and that is to show Elon Musk that we are all he has left and they he will be nothing without us. If he doesn't acquiesce, then we need to see to it that he gets the Budweiser treatment. It will be a powerful reminder to the world elite of the greatness of America.

"A true victory is to make your enemy see they were wrong to oppose you in the first place. To force them to acknowledge your greatness."-Gul Dukat
